author: MrInsane
name: ModSlash
description: A moderation cog that uses slash commands and respects both role hierarchy and a custom list of moderator roles. Includes kick, ban, mute, and deafen commands.
install_msg: Thank you for installing the ModSlash cog! Use `/modslashset addrole` to configure which roles can use the moderation commands.
short: Moderation slash commands with configurable roles.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store data or metadata about users.
